title: On the Horn vs Rocha Debate | Ep 51
description:
I discuss the recent debate over the permissibility of "Catholic socialism" featuring Trent Horn and Sam Rocha.
It's important to note that I definitely disagree with Horn, but I disagree much more strongly with Rocha.

Trent Horn vs Sam Rocha Debate
